content.description: This is an obvious horn / shifter knob shaped Boulder (The Chipmunk Boulder - Might be some info in Phoenix Rock II by Greg Opland?) right across the trail front the Echo ViewPoint rest area - about 1/4 mile up the trail from the parking lot to the Summit.Stand start (update: or sit for an extra move or two) in the overhang on two side pulls and make your way up and over the large discolored rock at the top. I give this 5 stars for the shape of the rock, the photo opp, and some pretty cool moves. Best boulder route (imo) that I found near the mountain in a few days of hunting around.
content.location: Right across the trail from the view point bench. The overhang side.

content.description: Boulder(s) right next to the view point and bench, on the other side of the Trail from the Bench
